title: Goodbye, DonGlees!
synopsis: The film depicts the miracle-like encounter of the "DonGlees" boys. At the end of an adventure with friends that began during an unusual summer vacation, the boys arrive in Icelandâ€”the land of flames and ice. What "treasure" have the boys found by looking at themselves and transcending the world...!
